trans-unit.target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_INACTIVE_TASK_ABORT<tab>The assigned venture will be abandoned as it is no longer available.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LVUP_NO_CLASS<tab>Unable to use <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8020202 /var>. You must first assign a class for your retainer.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LVUP_NO_EFFECT<tab>Unable to use <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8020202 /var>. Your retainer has already attained level <var 20 E803 /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LVUP_CAP_PLAYER<tab>Your retainer cannot exceed your own level.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ASK_PLAYER_LVSYNC<tab>You can only advance your retainer as far as level <var 20 E802 /var>, to match your current level. Do you wish to proceed?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LVUP_NO_ITEM<tab>You do not have <var 31 ((Item)) 02E8020202 /var> in your possession.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ASK_USE_LVUP_ITEM<tab>Give <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8020202 /var> to your retainer?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ASK_USE_LVUP_ITEM_CHECK<tab>Advance retainer to level <var 20 E802 /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_DEFAULT_TALK<tab>You have not yet received approval to hire retainers.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_NO_RETAINERS_AVAILABLE<tab>You have not yet hired a retainer.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_CALL_RETAINER_FAILED<tab>Your retainer did not respond.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_DISABLE_RETAINER_BELL<tab>The bell does not seem to be functioning...
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_CALL_FAILED_NO_CHARGE<tab>You cannot summon that retainer unless you resume payment for their services.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_RESET_ERROR_EQUIPMENT<tab>You cannot change your retainer's class/job until all gear has been removed.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_NO_CURRENT_TASK<tab>Your retainer has not been assigned a venture.

TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_RECOMMEND_JOB_CHANGE<tab>Your retainer is qualified to be trained in more advanced traditions. Select <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Assign retainer a job<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> to proceed.

TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_SUGGEST_JOB_CHANGE<tab>To train your retainer in a more advanced tradition, select <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Assign retainer a job<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> to proceed.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_SUGGEST_JOB_SCROLL<tab>To assign your retainer a job, you must purchase <var 31 ((Item)) 02E8020202 /var> from a retainer vocate and have it in your inventory.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_JOB_ERROR_EQUIPMENT<tab>You cannot assign your retainer the <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80201 /var> job until all gear has been removed.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_JOB_ERROR_NEED_RETAINER_LEVEL<tab>You cannot assign your retainer the <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80201 /var> job until they have achieved level <var 20 E803 /var>.

TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_JOB_ERROR_NEED_PLAYER_LEVEL<tab>You cannot assign your retainer the <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80201 /var> job until you achieve level <var 20 E803 /var> as <var 08 E4E8020B ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80201 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8020F ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80201 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80206 ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80201 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8021B ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80201 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80222 ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80201 /var>)) ((a <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80201 /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>.

TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_JOB_ERROR_LOW_PLAYER_LEVEL<tab>You cannot assign your retainer the <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80201 /var> job until you yourself achieve a higher level as <var 08 E4E8020B ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80201 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8020F ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80201 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80206 ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80201 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8021B ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80201 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80222 ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80201 /var>)) ((a <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80201 /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_JOB_ERROR_NO_ITEM<tab>Unable to proceed. You do not have <var 31 ((Item)) 02E8020202 /var> in your possession.

TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_JOB_CHANGE_SUCCESS<tab>Your retainer has become <var 08 E4E8020B ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80201 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8020F ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80201 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80206 ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80201 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8021B ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80201 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80222 ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80201 /var>)) ((a <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80201 /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_JOB_CHANGE_FAILED<tab>You were unable to assign your retainer a job.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ASK_BE_CHANGE_JOB<tab>Your retainer has attained sufficient experience to be assigned a job. Would you like to do so?

TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ASK_CHANGE_JOB<tab>Entrust your copy of <var 1A 02 /var>Modern Vocation<var 1A 01 /var> to your retainer and bid them learn the ways of the <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80301 /var>?
<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Please note that retainers cannot change jobs without resetting all progress.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ASK_CHANGE_JOB_CHECK<tab>Assign job.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ASK_RESET_JOB<tab>Your retainer's copy of <var 1A 02 /var>Modern Vocation<var 1A 01 /var> will be permanently discarded. Are you sure you wish to proceed?

TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ASK_RESET_CLASS<tab>Reset <var 29 EA02 /var>'s class/job? (<var 2B ((<var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80301 /var>)) /var>: Level <var 20 E804 /var>) <var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>※Resetting will revert this class/job to level 1.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> <var 08 E4E80602 ((<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>※Retainer venture history will also be reset.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> )) (()) /var>
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ASK_RESET_CLASS_CHECK<tab>Reset class/job.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_GO_BACK<tab>Return.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_NO_CLASS_WARNING<tab>You must select a class for your retainer before you assign a venture.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ASK_CATEGORY<tab>Select a category.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_TASK_CATEGORY_NORMAL<tab>Hunting.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_TASK_CATEGORY_TREASURE<tab>Field Exploration.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_TASK_CATEGORY_MINER_1<tab>Mining.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_TASK_CATEGORY_MINER_2<tab>Highland Exploration.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_TASK_CATEGORY_BOTANIST_1<tab>Botany.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_TASK_CATEGORY_BOTANIST_2<tab>Woodland Exploration.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_TASK_CATEGORY_FISHER_1<tab>Fishing.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_TASK_CATEGORY_FISHER_2<tab>Waterside Exploration.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_CLASS_EXPLAIN_BATTLE<tab>As a Disciple of War or Magic, your retainer will be able to undertake hunting and field exploration ventures.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_CLASS_EXPLAIN_MINER<tab>As a miner, your retainer will be able to undertake mining and highland exploration ventures.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_CLASS_EXPLAIN_BOTANIST<tab>As a botanist, your retainer will be able to undertake botany and woodland exploration ventures.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_CLASS_EXPLAIN_FISHER<tab>As a fisher, your retainer will be able to undertake fishing and waterside exploration ventures.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_CLASS_NOT_UNLOCKED<tab>You have not yet unlocked this class and therefore cannot assign it to your retainer.

TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_CLASS_CONFIRM_ASK<tab><var 29 EA02 /var> will become <var 08 E4E8030B ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80301 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8030F ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80301 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80306 ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80301 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8031B ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80301 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80322 ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80301 /var>)) ((a <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80301 /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>. Are you certain you wish to proceed?

TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_CLASS_RESET_DONE<tab><var 29 EA02 /var> is no longer <var 08 E4E8030B ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80301 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8030F ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80301 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80306 ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80301 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8031B ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80301 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80322 ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80301 /var>)) ((a <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80301 /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_PLEASE_SET_CLASS<tab>You must assign your retainer a class before viewing attributes and gear.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_NO_RESET_DURING_TASK<tab>You cannot reset the class/job of a retainer with a venture that has not been completed.

TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_RESET_CLASS_QUESTION<tab>You are about to reset your retainer's class/job. Please note that this process cannot be reversed, and all progress will be permanently lost. Are you certain you wish to proceed?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ASK_RETURN_WITH_BUYBACK<tab>Your retainer will be unable to process item buyback requests once recalled. Are you sure you wish to proceed?

TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_CURRENCY_CHANGE1<tab>A venture promissory note cannot be used as is; you must first redeem it for ventures. The amount of ventures you possess is shown in the Currency window.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ABOUT_RETAINER_TIP_1<tab>You do not have any ventures in your inventory and therefore cannot assign your retainer a venture.

TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ABOUT_RETAINER_TIP_2<tab>Ventures can be acquired through a variety of methods such as exchanging company seals, fulfilling leve objectives, and completing allied society quests.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ABOUT_RETAINER_TIP_3<tab>If you possess a venture promissory note, you may redeem it for ventures through a Calamity salvager.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_TASK_CATEGORY_FORTUNE<tab>Quick Exploration.

TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_FORTUNE_TASK_UNLOCK_1<tab>Your retainer is now experienced enough to undertake <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>quick exploration ventures<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_FORTUNE_TASK_UNLOCK_2<tab>Select <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>assign venture<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> from the retainer menu to proceed.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENABLE_TASK_ORDER_FOR_SIGHT_1<tab>Check the Companion App for ventures pending completion before assigning a new venture.

TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_TUTORIAL_INTRO_1<tab>You can now send your retainers afield on procurement expeditions known as <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>ventures<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_TUTORIAL_INTRO_2<tab>Before you can do so, however, you must first assign them a class.

TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_TUTORIAL_INTRO_3<tab>After summoning a retainer, select <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>assign retainer class<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> from the retainer menu to begin.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_TUTORIAL_CLASS_1<tab>Your retainer cannot undertake ventures until you assign his or her class.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_TUTORIAL_CLASS_2<tab>This can be any one class, with the exception of those of the Disciples of the Hand.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_TUTORIAL_CLASS_3<tab>Your retainer's class determines which ventures he or she can embark upon.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_TUTORIAL_CLASS_4<tab>Please be advised that you cannot assign your retainer a class you have not yet unlocked.

TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_TUTORIAL_FIRST_CLASS_1<tab><var 29 EA02 /var> has become <var 08 E4E8030B ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80301 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8030F ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80301 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80306 ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80301 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8031B ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80301 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80322 ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80301 /var>)) ((a <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80301 /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_TUTORIAL_FIRST_CLASS_2<tab>You must now equip a main arm to your retainer.

TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_TUTORIAL_FIRST_CLASS_3<tab>Select <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>view retainer attributes and gear<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> from the retainer menu to proceed.

TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_TUTORIAL_SECOND_CLASS_1<tab><var 29 EA02 /var> has become <var 08 E4E8030B ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80301 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8030F ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80301 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80306 ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80301 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8031B ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80301 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80322 ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80301 /var>)) ((a <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80301 /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_TUTORIAL_SECOND_CLASS_2<tab>Please be advised that your retainer must be equipped with a main arm in order to undertake ventures.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_TUTORIAL_CLASS_RESET_1<tab>If you wish to assign your retainer a different class, you must first reset his or her current class.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_TUTORIAL_CLASS_RESET_2<tab>If necessary, recall your retainer and remove all gear to proceed.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_TUTORIAL_EQUIP_1<tab>You can equip any item in your inventory or Armoury Chest to your retainer, so long as he or she meets the requirements.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_TUTORIAL_EQUIP_2<tab>Equip a main arm to your retainer to proceed.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_TUTORIAL_FIRST_WEAPON_1<tab>You have equipped a main arm to <var 29 EA02 /var>!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_TUTORIAL_FIRST_WEAPON_2<tab>Your retainer is now duly prepared to undertake ventures.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_TUTORIAL_FIRST_WEAPON_3<tab>Select <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>assign venture<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> from the retainer menu to proceed.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_CLASS_EXPLAIN_START<tab>As you may recall, the ventures your retainer can undertake are determined by his or her class.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ABOUT_VENTURES_1<tab>There are two main types of ventures which you can assign your retainer.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ABOUT_VENTURES_2<tab>Hunting, Mining, Botany, and Fishing constitute one type, in which you specify an item for your retainer to procure.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ABOUT_VENTURES_3<tab>Exploration ventures constitute the second type, in which your retainer will scour the terrain of your choosing for (hopefully) precious items.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ABOUT_VENTURES_4<tab>However, your retainer will not undertake a venture without first receiving due compensation.

TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ABOUT_VENTURES_5<tab>Assigning a venture requires a payment in a unique currency of the same name─<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>ventures<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.

TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ABOUT_VENTURES_6<tab>Ventures can be acquired through a variety of methods such as exchanging company seals, fulfilling leve objectives, and completing allied society quests.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_FIRST_VENTURE_1<tab>You have assigned <var 29 EA02 /var> a venture!

TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_FIRST_VENTURE_2<tab>To confirm the time remaining until a venture is complete, select <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Timers<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> under Duty from the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>main menu<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, and select <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Ventures<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.

TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_FIRST_VENTURE_3<tab>You can also confirm the time remaining by selecting <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>view venture report<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> from the retainer menu.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_FIRST_VENTURE_4<tab>Should you wish to cancel the venture and recall your retainer, you may do so when viewing the venture report.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_FIRST_VENTURE_5<tab>However, please be advised that this is not necessary unless you wish to assign a different venture to your retainer.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_FIRST_VENTURE_6<tab>Even with a venture in progress, you can still entrust or withdraw items and gil, or sell items on the market.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_FIRST_COMPLETED_1<tab><var 29 EA02 /var> has completed a venture!

TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_FIRST_COMPLETED_2<tab>To claim the fruits of your retainer's labor, select <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>view venture report<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> from the retainer menu.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_TUTORIAL_FINISHED_1<tab><var 29 EA02 /var> has gained experience for completing a venture!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_TUTORIAL_FINISHED_2<tab>Like you, your retainer can gain experience and levels.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_TUTORIAL_FINISHED_3<tab>This, in turn, will allow your retainer to undertake a wider variety of ventures, yielding more desirable items.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_TUTORIAL_FINISHED_4<tab>Moreover, equipping additional gear to your retainer will increase both the quantity and quality of the items procured.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ABOUT_FORTUNE_TASK_1<tab>Quick exploration ventures are brief assignments in which you dispatch your retainer without instruction.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ABOUT_FORTUNE_TASK_2<tab>The items your retainer procures on these ventures can range from worthless to priceless.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ABOUT_FORTUNE_TASK_3<tab>Moreover, the experience your retainer receives for completing a quick exploration venture is determined by their level.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ABOUT_FORTUNE_TASK_4<tab>Although it is impossible to predict the results of these ventures, the potential benefits should not be underestimated.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ABOUT_MIRAGEPRISM_1<tab>Glamours can be applied to gear equipped by or in the possession of your retainers.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ABOUT_MIRAGEPRISM_2<tab>Moreover, gear equipped by or in the possession of your retainers can be used to apply glamours to your equipped gear, or gear in your inventory.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ABOUT_MIRAGEPRISM_3<tab>Please note a glamour prism is required for each piece of gear you wish to glamour.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ABOUT_EQUIPPAINT_1<tab>Dyes can be used to change the color of any gear equipped by or in the possession of your retainers.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE1<tab>I have come, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE2<tab>Nothin' fer ye to worry about.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE3<tab>You summoned?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE4<tab>Yes? <sigh> I hope this doesn't take long...
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE5<tab>You wish to see how a master handles a bazaar?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE6<tab>Hello, hello! You called?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>At your service, my <var 08 E905 ((lady)) ((lord)) /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>What's it to be this time, love?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>What would you ask?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>I'm so sorry to keep you waiting, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. So very, very sorry.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>Quickly now, I've places to be.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>Well, if it ain't my favorite client! Always a pleasure, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE1<tab>Yes, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>? What is your bidding?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE2<tab>What's on the agenda, chief? Deprivin' saps o' their hard-earned gil?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE3<tab>I have come. You may proceed.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE4<tab>Oh, hello there. To what do I owe the pleasure?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE5<tab>I am come to conduct business, and only business.

TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE6<tab>You look to be in good health, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. How may I assist you this fine <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((eve)) ((morn)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((day)) ((eve)) /var>)) /var>?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>What is it you would have me do, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>Usually, it's me doin' the summons and others doin' the waitin'.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>Is there something that I can help you with?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>Oh, why must you summon me at a time like this...?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>I'm sure there is a perfectly good explanation for this summons.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>You know, I thought you might be along to summon me. You may rest assured that I am ready and eager to serve.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE1<tab>Hail to thee, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. Your humble servant has heard your summons.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE2<tab>Greetin's and salutations, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>. Pray speak yer desires, an' I'll do me damndest to see 'em done.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE3<tab>I was wondering when you'd get around to calling me.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE4<tab>Mind if we keep this brief? I've got a pretty little thing that's waitin' for me.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE5<tab>What?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE6<tab>I'm here, I'm here!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>Here I am, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var>, as per your request.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>'Ello, dearie. What's on the docket?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>I never miss a chance to line these pockets.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>Well, this is unexpected! What'll it be?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>What is it now?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>Here I aaaaaam!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE1<tab>How may I be of serrrvice, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE2<tab>It's a war out there, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>. You have no idea.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE3<tab>...
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE4<tab>Business or pleasure?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE5<tab>I presume you did not summon me solely for the pleasure of my company.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE6<tab>Just the <var 08 E905 ((fair maiden)) ((handsome fellow)) /var> I was hoping to see! Tell me your heart's desire.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>I hope your catcall is not one of disapproval.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>Ye rang, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>A cat's ears do not miss much―least of all a summons.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>Curiosity called the cat. What do you have for me today?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>Ready when you are.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>I was just thinking of you!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE1<tab>What need have you of me today, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE2<tab>Bwahahaha! Ye got work needs gettin' done? Just point me in the right bloody direction.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE3<tab>I've come. What is it?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE4<tab>Hey there─hic─<var 08 E905 ((missy)) ((mate)) /var>! Care to join me fer a pint?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE5<tab>Couldn't come no quicker. Where's the work?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE6<tab>I came runnin' soon as I heard the bell! Ye need somethin', chief?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>I am at your disposal, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>Ye got somethin' fer me, cap'n?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>Go ahead, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>Let's keep this short and sweet, shall we?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>This wouldn't be necessary if you entrusted your financial affairs to me.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>So─sellin', buyin', drinkin', whorin'? What's it to be today?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_AURA_MALE_TYPE1<tab>Greetings, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. How may I be of service?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_AURA_MALE_TYPE2<tab>What'll it be, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((mate)) /var>?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_AURA_MALE_TYPE3<tab>State your business.

TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_AURA_MALE_TYPE4<tab>And how does this wonderful <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((evening)) ((day)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((day)) ((evening)) /var>)) /var> find you?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_AURA_MALE_TYPE5<tab>Well... Here I am...<var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_AURA_MALE_TYPE6<tab>We work the market stalls,♪ And our uniforms are pretty;♪ We are sober men and true,♪ And attentive to our duties!♪
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab><var 08 E905 ((My lady)) ((My lord)) /var>. What would you ask of me?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>So. We doing this?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>Yes?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>Hey, it's...it's you! Hello again, you!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>I-It's not like I want to sell your items or anything.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>What do you have for me? Come on, come on! Don't be shy!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE1<tab>You rang, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE2<tab>I trust this will be worth my while.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE3<tab><var 1A 02 /var>What<var 1A 01 /var>?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE4<tab>Whatever you need, leave it to me! I have my methods.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE5<tab>Gahaha! If it isn't my favorite <var 08 E905 ((mistress)) ((master)) /var>!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE6<tab>It is I, your most loyal and capable retainer!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_HROTHGAR_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>You summoned me, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_HROTHGAR_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>At your beck an' call, I am!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_HROTHGAR_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>You called, and I have come.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_HROTHGAR_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>At last─I thought you'd <var 1A 02 /var>never<var 1A 01 /var> call. What does <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var> need of me?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_HROTHGAR_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>Could it be...? The famous <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> has called on <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var>? <chuckle>
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_HROTHGAR_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>Yes, yes, here I am! Ready at a moment's notice!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>What will it be, love?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>Your orders! I would hear them at once!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>If there is something you would ask of me, then ask it.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>Yes...? Is there something you─<yawn>─need?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>A task for me? I hope it's something fun!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>I am here to do your every bidding, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var>! Ask of me anything at all!

TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_VIERA_MALE_TYPE1<tab>I have been awaiting your summons, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. What would you have of me this fine <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((evening)) ((morning)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((day)) ((evening)) /var>)) /var>?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_VIERA_MALE_TYPE2<tab>What can I do for ye, yer <var 08 E905 ((ladyship)) ((lordship)) /var>?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_VIERA_MALE_TYPE3<tab>You called, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>...?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_VIERA_MALE_TYPE4<tab>You─hic─rang?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_VIERA_MALE_TYPE5<tab>Need my assistance, do you? Let's make this quick, then.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_VIERA_MALE_TYPE6<tab>You have my ear, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>. Both of them, in fact!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE1<tab>If that is all, I will take my leave now, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE2<tab>Take care o' yerself, hear?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE3<tab>Until we next meet.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE4<tab>Well, it's about time. Good-bye.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE5<tab>I believe thanks are in order.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE6<tab>I'm off, then!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>With your leave, my <var 08 E905 ((lady)) ((lord)) /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>Don't you worry 'bout a thing. I got this.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>Farewell, then.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>If there is nothing else, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>, I'll be going now.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>Is that all? Very well, until next time.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>Oh, will that be all today? Very well, but promise me you'll come back soon!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE1<tab>As always, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>, it has been an honor and a privilege.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE2<tab>You can count on me, chief─I know how to get things done.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE3<tab>Don't be a stranger.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE4<tab>I swear it shall be done. Eventually.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE5<tab>As you wish.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE6<tab>Capital! I shall carry out your orders forthwith.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>I humbly await your next summons, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>Don't leave me alone for too long, hear?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>Always a pleasure.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>That will be all, yes? Then if you would excuse me...
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>I believe that concludes our dealings for now.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>Are you certain you don't desire anything else? Anything at all? Very well, I shall take my leave.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE1<tab>Your every whim shall be swiftly carried out with due care and consideration.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE2<tab>Shouldn't take more than a moment, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE3<tab>I'll be going, then.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE4<tab>Thank the gods we're finished. I've got plans to put my hands in places I've never seen...if you know what I mean.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE5<tab>Be well.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE6<tab>I'm off, I'm off!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>Until we meet again!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>Blessin's o' the Twelve upon ye.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>May Nald'thal see fit to fatten our pockets!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>Very good, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>! Your wish is my command, and so forth.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>You know how to reach me.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>Is it time for good-byes already? I'm going to miss you...
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE1<tab>Thy will be done.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE2<tab>The markets may be a bleedin' battlefield, but I'm a godsdamned soldier. You can count on me, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE3<tab>...
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE4<tab>Why so serrrious? <sigh> So it goes.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE5<tab>I hardly think that warranted my personal appearance, but what is done is done.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE6<tab>Then I have satisfied your every need? Excellent! I do so take pleasure in servicing my clients.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>Good-bye for now, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sirrr)) /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>Right then, let's get on with it!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>There is no call for concerrrn.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>When the master's away, the cat will play.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>Gods, this is tirin'...
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>You don't want to be with me anymore? <sniffle>
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE1<tab>I shall carry out your wishes as instructed, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE2<tab>Bwahahaha! I'm in yer bazaar, sellin' yer wares!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE3<tab>I will go now.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE4<tab>Awww, bugger. Reckon I best get to work...
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE5<tab>I don't do good-byes.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE6<tab>Go and grab yourself some shut-eye, chief. You look terrible!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>Will that be all for today, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>? Understood.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>Aye, aye, cap'n!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>Duly noted.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>Not exactly how I was hopin' to spend my day, but I suppose it can't be helped.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>Ours is not to reason why. Ours is but to do and die.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>Ever the consummate professional, I see. Another time, then.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_AURA_MALE_TYPE1<tab>If there is nothing else, then I shall take my leave.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_AURA_MALE_TYPE2<tab>Is that all? Guess I'll be on my way, then.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_AURA_MALE_TYPE3<tab>Any last requests? Very well. Heh heh heh... Ahem.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_AURA_MALE_TYPE4<tab>Ah, yes, of course. Duty calls!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_AURA_MALE_TYPE5<tab>You are finished with me, then?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_AURA_MALE_TYPE6<tab>Here today and gone tomorrow;♪ Yes, I know─♪ That is so!♪
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>If ever you have need of me, just ring.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>Always a pleasure, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>Right, then.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>Finished already? Guess that's that, then.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>You're leaving already? Fine, then! I-It's not like I wanted you to stay or anything.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>Very good, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>! Very good indeed!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE1<tab>Always a pleasure to serve, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE2<tab>Hmph. I hope that next time you will have a more meaningful task for me.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE3<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Good-bye<var 1A 01 /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE4<tab>And with that, I shall be off. Places to go, people to see.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE5<tab>Bahahaha! Till next time, my friend!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE6<tab>Ring for me whenever you please! You know that I will never let you down!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_HROTHGAR_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>I'm glad to have been of service. Mind you don't overdo things, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_HROTHGAR_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>Had your fill of me, eh? Fair enough! Let me know if you need aught else!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_HROTHGAR_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>We're done? Then I take my leave.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_HROTHGAR_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>There's naught else <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var> requires? I'll be sharpening my claws, then, waiting for your next summons.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_HROTHGAR_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>Nothing else? Right... I'll be off!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_HROTHGAR_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>Have everything you need? I'll take a little nap, then.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>Must we part so soon?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>And I am off!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>Call on me as you please. If I am so inclined, I will answer.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>That is all, I suppose...? <yawn> Very well...
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>That is all? Oh, I was hoping there'd be more...
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>Is that all you need of me? But I could yet serve you in so many ways!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_VIERA_MALE_TYPE1<tab>Do not hesitate to call upon me again. Fare you well in your endeavors, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_VIERA_MALE_TYPE2<tab>Just say the word, yer <var 08 E905 ((ladyship)) ((lordship)) /var>, and I'll be here with bells on.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_VIERA_MALE_TYPE3<tab>If you have no further need of my services...
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_VIERA_MALE_TYPE4<tab>I'm off for another glass, then. You know where to find me!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_VIERA_MALE_TYPE5<tab>What─is that it? Are you <var 1A 02 /var>sure<var 1A 01 /var> you need a retainer?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_VIERA_MALE_TYPE6<tab>Nothing else? Then I shall be hopping along.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE1<tab>Your bidding will be done, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE2<tab>Easy now, easy. I'm on it.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE3<tab>And so it begins.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE4<tab>Very well, if I must...
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE5<tab>I shall see to things from here.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE6<tab>Leave it to me!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>I understand, my <var 08 E905 ((lady)) ((lord)) /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>Hah! I'll be back afore you know it.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>If that is what you would ask of me.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>I'll give it my best, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>Your enterprise is in capable hands, I assure you.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>I won't let you down, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE1<tab>I shall not fail you, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE2<tab>No need to worry, chief─this is where I shine.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE3<tab>Leave it to me.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE4<tab>Whatever you say.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE5<tab>Good. I prefer to work alone.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE6<tab>Ahhh, I do so enjoy the occasional excursion!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>As you ask, so shall it be done, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>Work to be done, eh? All right, then.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>I'll take care of everything.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>A venture? <var 1A 02 /var>Now<var 1A 01 /var>? Well, if you insist.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>I am well aware of how this works.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>That sounds like fun! You'll be joining me, yes? <var 1A 02 /var>No<var 1A 01 /var>? Oh.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE1<tab>You will not be disappointed, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE2<tab>You got it, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE3<tab>That's it? All right.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE4<tab>Hope you ain't expectin' me to rush. I wanna take it nice and slow.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE5<tab>I think I can manage from here.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE6<tab>I'll do it, I'll do it!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>It is an honor to serve you, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>Is that all? A triflin' task!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>If there's profit to be made, I'll make it.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>My every waking minute will be spent working on your behalf, et cetera.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>Fine...for now. But you're asking a bit much, considering what I'm paid.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>Time to shine, hee hee!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE1<tab>Excellent decision, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. Venturrres are my specialty.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE2<tab>A special solo mission? Hells, why didn't you say so sooner! Of course I'll do it!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE3<tab>...
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE4<tab>Business. Always business with you. Fine...
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE5<tab>Leave me to my task, and we shall both be satisfied.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE6<tab>You will be most pleased with the result. I guarantee it!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>It shall be done forthwith, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sirrr)) /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>Ah, I was in the mood for a jaunt outside!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>You needn't say another worrrd.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>I'll start now, if that's what you want.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>Not quite <var 1A 02 /var>ad<var 1A 01 /var>venturin', but it's close enough.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>I'll do anything you say, exactly as you say.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE1<tab>I shall not keep you waiting overlong, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE2<tab>Bwahahaha! So that's what this is about! I'll handle it!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE3<tab>Understood.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE4<tab>Nothing─hic─nothing to it!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE5<tab>I can go now, right? Great.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE6<tab>I'll give it everything I've got, chief!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>I will not be long, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>Ye picked the right woman fer the job, cap'n!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>I see. All right, then.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>Oh, for the love of─ Really? Godsdammit.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>I see you finally have the good sense to grant me greater autonomy.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>Oho, so it's venturin', it is! This ought to be fun.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_AURA_MALE_TYPE1<tab>Neither rain nor sleet nor ferocious beasts shall keep me from my task.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_AURA_MALE_TYPE2<tab>Venture, eh? Ain't nothin' to it.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_AURA_MALE_TYPE3<tab>Oh, I'll get busy. I'll get very busy, indeed.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_AURA_MALE_TYPE4<tab>What? I mean, I'm flattered you think I can handle it, but...
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_AURA_MALE_TYPE5<tab>I don't recall this being part of my contract...
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_AURA_MALE_TYPE6<tab>A simple retainer, lowly born,♪ Unlettered and unknown,♪ Who toils for bread from early morn,♪ Till half the night has flown!♪
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab><var 08 E905 ((My lady)) ((My lord)) /var> shall not be disappointed.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>Sure, why not? I'll give it a go!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>I see.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>I'll do it! I'll rob the─ I mean, er, what you said.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>A v-venture!? Great! It's not like I would rather spend time with you or anything.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>Oh, a challenge! Far be it from me to deny you!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE1<tab>Your every wish is my command.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE2<tab>I will perform your menial task.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE3<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Fine<var 1A 01 /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE4<tab>No worries, boss. Consider it done.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE5<tab>Gahahaha! It's as good as done!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE6<tab>But of course! Your favorite retainer would be <var 1A 02 /var>more<var 1A 01 /var> than happy to do that!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_HROTHGAR_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>Time to get to work, is it? I'll do my best to return with good news.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_HROTHGAR_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>Say no more. It's all under control!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_HROTHGAR_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>...If that is your wish.

TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_HROTHGAR_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>I suppose I had best be going! I'd never wish to disappoint <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var>, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_HROTHGAR_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>I'll do it, but only because it's you asking, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. You should feel special! <chuckle>
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_HROTHGAR_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>Understood! I'll take care of it!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>Anything for you, love.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>Hah! Leave it to me!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>A less-than-stimulating task, but I will acquiesce.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>Very well...if you insist.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>That certainly sounds interesting! Well, I'd best be on my way!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>If that is your heart's desire, then so it shall be!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_VIERA_MALE_TYPE1<tab>As you have commanded, so I will see it done!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_VIERA_MALE_TYPE2<tab>Right ye are, then!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_VIERA_MALE_TYPE3<tab>Very good, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. Consider it done.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_VIERA_MALE_TYPE4<tab>But of course, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>! I'm not as─hic─unsteady as all that!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_VIERA_MALE_TYPE5<tab>I'll take care of it. Just as long as you're suitably grateful.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_VIERA_MALE_TYPE6<tab>I'll see it done in two shakes of a rabbit's tail!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE1<tab>I pray this meets with your satisfaction, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE2<tab>How's that grab ye?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE3<tab>Take it.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE4<tab>Let's not do this again for a while, shall we?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE5<tab>Do not behave as though you are not impressed.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE6<tab>Not bad, eh?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>May it please you, my <var 08 E905 ((lady)) ((lord)) /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>How do you like me now, love?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>It is what it is.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>That's the last of it.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>Of course it was a success. Did you doubt me?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>I think that went well, don't you?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE1<tab>It was my pleasure, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE2<tab>A rousin' success, if I do say so myself.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE3<tab>Enough?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE4<tab>It's all yours. Enjoy.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE5<tab>I trust you have no complaints? Good.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE6<tab>What I wouldn't give to do this all the time!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>Does it please you, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>One day it'll be me givin' the orders.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>Let me know when you want me to handle another.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>A thoroughly pedestrian result, I'm afraid. I would understand if you decided not to assign me ventures henceforth.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>And there you have it.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>I live to serve.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE1<tab>Your humble servant hopes that you find the fruits of his labor acceptable.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE2<tab>Could be better, but could be worse.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE3<tab>Here, as promised.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE4<tab>I knew I could satisfy your needs.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE5<tab>Here.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE6<tab>Take it, take it!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>My only regret is that I could not return sooner.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>Go on, dearie, take it!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>'Twas a most profitable venture, I'd say.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>Always a pleasure to serve, and so on and so forth.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>You're welcome.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>Some of my finest work yet!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE1<tab>It is an honor to serrrve, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE2<tab>I await your orders, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE3<tab>...
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE4<tab>Why don't we both take it easy for a while?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE5<tab>And with that, we can move on to more important matters.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE6<tab>Was it everything you hoped it would be?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>Your goods, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sirrr)) /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>Just what ye wanted, am I right?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>Thank you for your patronage.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>Can I go now?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>And that's the end of that chapter.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>I hope you like it...
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE1<tab>If you require aught else, you need only ask.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE2<tab>Bwahahaha!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE3<tab>Here.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE4<tab>Why don't we toast our success with a pint or two?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE5<tab>If you want, I can undertake another one right now.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE6<tab>It's all there, chief. Ye have me word.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab><var 08 E905 ((Milady)) ((Milord)) /var> is satisfied, I trust?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>A good haul, all in all.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>A pleasure as always.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>Hope you're godsdamned happy.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>You yourself could do no better.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>That ought to do it.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_AURA_MALE_TYPE1<tab>I pray that you are pleased with the result, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_AURA_MALE_TYPE2<tab>Bet you weren't expecting <var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var> now, were you?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_AURA_MALE_TYPE3<tab>Ah, for the days when ventures were a gentleman's pursuit...
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_AURA_MALE_TYPE4<tab>If you don't mind me saying, I think I did rather well.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_AURA_MALE_TYPE5<tab>I will be expected to do this again, I gather.

TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_AURA_MALE_TYPE6<tab>Can I survive this overbearing,♪ Or live a life of mad despairing,♪ My proffered goods despised, rejected?♪ No, no, it's not to be expected!♪
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>I live to serve, <var 08 E905 ((my lady)) ((my lord)) /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>All's well that ends well, wouldn't you say?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>There it is.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>All acquired in accordance with local laws. <wink> <wink>
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>Alright, take yer shite and quit leerin' at me arse. ...What? Ye can't seriously expect me to humor yer fetishes all the time, can ye?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>Hardly my finest work, but I'm not ashamed to say I did it.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE1<tab>Only the best for you, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE2<tab>This is what you asked for, yes? So take it.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE3<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Here<var 1A 01 /var>.

TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE4<tab>Here's what you wanted! And, er...let us focus on the <var 1A 02 /var>what<var 1A 01 /var> and not talk about the <var 1A 02 /var>how<var 1A 01 /var>, yes?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE5<tab>Bahahaha! How do you like <var 1A 02 /var>this<var 1A 01 /var>!?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE6<tab>Look what I brought, just for you!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_HROTHGAR_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>I hope my performance was to your satisfaction, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_HROTHGAR_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>This is the part where I give you the good news. Here─get an eyeful of that!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_HROTHGAR_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>I submit my report.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_HROTHGAR_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>Well? Have I made you happy? I do so <var 1A 02 /var>love<var 1A 01 /var> to see you smile.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_HROTHGAR_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>I did what you asked. Now, where's my words of praise? <chuckle>
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_HROTHGAR_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>Take a look! A perfect performance, if I do say so myself!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>I do hope it pleases you.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>Behold! This is what you seek, yes!?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>I believe this is what you sought of me.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>The deed is done. <yawn> Now, time for a rest...
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>Well? Do you like it? Oh, say that you do!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>Behold the fruits of my labor! I do hope it is everything you expected.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_VIERA_MALE_TYPE1<tab>I trust this meets with your satisfaction, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>? After all, your contented smile is my greatest reward!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_VIERA_MALE_TYPE2<tab>Does that meet with <var 08 E905 ((her ladyship)) ((his lordship)) /var>'s approval? (It bloody better...)
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_VIERA_MALE_TYPE3<tab>No need to thank me, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. Fulfilling one's duty is its own reward.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_VIERA_MALE_TYPE4<tab>Not bad, eh? In fact, I think we should pop a cork to celebrate!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_VIERA_MALE_TYPE5<tab>This is what you wanted, yes? I told you I'd take care of it.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_VIERA_MALE_TYPE6<tab>And there you have it, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>─all wrapped up like a Hatching<var 1F /var>tide gift basket.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE1<tab>Do you require aught else, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var>?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE2<tab>Ye know I'm in the middle o' yer venture, don't ye?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE3<tab>What is it?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE4<tab>What now? I'm busy.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE5<tab>I trust there is a reason for this interruption?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE6<tab>I came as quickly as I could! What is it?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>Yes, my <var 08 E905 ((lady)) ((lord)) /var>?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>Somethin' else, love?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>Well? What is it?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>You couldn't have picked a more inconvenient time.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>This better be worth my time.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>What is it, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>? Something urgent?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE1<tab>You have additional orders, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE2<tab>Tell me you ain't got somethin' else for me, chief!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE3<tab>You have interrupted my venture. Proceed.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE4<tab>I'm here now, so...
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE5<tab>You interrupt my task. Why?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE6<tab>Apologies for the delay, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab><var 08 E905 ((Milady)) ((Milord)) /var> has another task for me?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>I'm a little busy, but what is it?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>Was there something else?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>Summons? <var 1A 02 /var>Now<var 1A 01 /var>? Well, if you insist.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>You do know how this works, right? You assign me a venture and then leave me to my task.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>Missed me, didn't you?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE1<tab>Hail to thee, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. Your humble servant has set aside his task and hastened to your side.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE2<tab>Why'd ye call me back from me venture, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE3<tab>This really isn't the best time.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE4<tab>I thought you were going to let me do this my way?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE5<tab>What!?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE6<tab>I'm back, I'm back!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>How may I serve you, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var>?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>Did somethin' 'appen, dearie?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>What's all this, then? Another chance for mischief?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab><yawn> Just so you know, I was busy carrying out your tasks.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>This had better be important.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>Whaaat is it?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE1<tab>I have rrreturned, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE2<tab><var 08 E905 ((Miss)) ((Sir)) /var>, you mustn't interrupt a soldier when he's on a mission!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE3<tab>...
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE4<tab>You would burden me with additional tasks?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE5<tab>I thought I asked you to leave me to my task?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE6<tab>You require additional services?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>Forgive me, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sirrr)) /var>, but your catcall comes at an inopportune time.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>Damn, just when I was startin' to enjoy meself!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>A cat must be allowed to focus on her task.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>You know I've not finished the venture yet, rrright?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>Mind explainin' what this is about?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>You know, you shouldn't summon me when I'm in the middle of a venture!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE1<tab>Did you require aught else, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE2<tab>Bwahahaha! Ye need somethin' else?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE3<tab>I've returned. What is it now?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE4<tab>Yeah? I was just enjoyin' a pint of─hic─uh, venturin'.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE5<tab>I've already got my hands full with this venture, but what is it?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE6<tab>What else ye need, chief?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>I am at <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>'s beck and call.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>What'll it be, cap'n?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab><var 08 E905 ((Madam)) ((Sir)) /var>?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>Godsdammit, what now?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>I do not take kindly to interruptions.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>Dammit, <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var>, did ye forget I was out on a venture?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_AURA_MALE_TYPE1<tab>Is aught amiss, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_AURA_MALE_TYPE2<tab>Something on your mind, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((mate)) /var>?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_AURA_MALE_TYPE3<tab>I have a life outside of <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var>, you know.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_AURA_MALE_TYPE4<tab>Let me tell you, it was absolute chaos out there. Quite frankly, I'm lucky to be alive! But I heard your call, and I knew I had to answer.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_AURA_MALE_TYPE5<tab>Worried about your venture? Don't be. Or have you some other reason for summoning me?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_AURA_MALE_TYPE6<tab>Fair moon, to thee I sing,♪ Bright regent of the heavens,♪ Say, why is everything♪ Either at sixes or at sevens?♪
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab><var 08 E905 ((My lady)) ((My lord)) /var>. Is there aught else you require?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>Can't say I was expecting this. What can I do for you?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>Do tell.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>Now, before you go jumping to conclusions, I'd just like to─ Oh! What can I do for you?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>I-It's not like I was slaving away to make you happy or anything.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>Somethin' else I can do for you, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>? Don't hold back now.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE1<tab>If there is something else you would have me do, you need only say the word.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE2<tab>I am here. I don't have to be happy about it.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE3<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Yes<var 1A 01 /var>?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE4<tab>Phew! Glad you got me out of <var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var>─er, never mind. What can I do you for?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE5<tab>Gahahaha! Couldn't wait to see you, myself!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE6<tab>Well, that was awfully sudden! You truly cannot get enough of me, can you?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_HROTHGAR_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>Need something taken care of immediately? You have only to say the word!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_HROTHGAR_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>Some kind of emergency, eh? No problem─I work even better under pressure.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_HROTHGAR_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>...Was there something else?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_HROTHGAR_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>My my, aren't we in a rush? I barely had time to get started.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_HROTHGAR_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>What? What's so damn important!? You're lucky you're on my good side...
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_HROTHGAR_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>Yes, yes, here I am again! Whatever could it be?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>I was hoping you would call, love.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>What is the matter? Why do you summon me back so soon!?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>I trust there is a good reason for this interruption?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab><yawn> You do know I was in the middle of something...yes?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>What is it this time? I was just beginning to have some fun...
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>You frightened me, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var>! Is something the matter!?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_VIERA_MALE_TYPE1<tab>I rushed back as soon as I heard your call. You have need of my services?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_VIERA_MALE_TYPE2<tab>I'm a bit sodding busy, yer <var 08 E905 ((ladyship)) ((lordship)) /var>. Ye get mud on yer shiny boots, or summat?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_VIERA_MALE_TYPE3<tab>Was there something else, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>...?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_VIERA_MALE_TYPE4<tab>What is it? What's wrong? ...Aside from me missing my favorite barstool?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_VIERA_MALE_TYPE5<tab>Yes? This is interfering with <var 1A 02 /var>your<var 1A 01 /var> venture, just so you know.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER2_VIERA_MALE_TYPE6<tab>Is something amiss? Or did you simply miss <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var>?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE1<tab>I shall return to my duties forthwith.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE2<tab>Right, then. Back to it.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE3<tab>If you would excuse me.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE4<tab>If there's nothing else...
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE5<tab>I shall return to <var 1A 02 /var>your<var 1A 01 /var> work.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE6<tab>You've got it!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>Pray excuse me, my <var 08 E905 ((lady)) ((lord)) /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>I'd best get goin'.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>Excuse me.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>Guess I'll get back to that venture you assigned me.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>That was not worth my time.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>I'll take care of it, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>, don't you worry!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE1<tab>As you wish, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE2<tab>Don't forget that I'm busy with this venture o' yours, chief!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE3<tab>I must go.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE4<tab>Sure, sure.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE5<tab>I have work to do.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE6<tab>Understood, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>! Oh, and fear not─the venture shall be completed on time!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>I shall carry out <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>'s wishes to the best of my ability.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>We finished? That venture's not goin' to finish itself.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>All right, then.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>If you would excuse me, I have a venture to finish.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>Unless it is urgent, do not summon me during a venture again.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>Are we finished already? Oh...
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE1<tab>Do not hesitate to call on me again, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE2<tab>I'll do what I can, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE3<tab>Back to my venture, then.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE4<tab>I can't keep runnin' back to see you during these ventures, you know.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE5<tab>Fine.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE6<tab>I'll go, I'll go!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>As ever, it is an honor, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>So much to do, so little time!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>We'd best see to our respective tasks, eh?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>Don't summon me, I'll summon you.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab><sigh> I am not getting paid enough for this.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>We'll talk again soon!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE1<tab>If there is naught else, I will rrresume my venture.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE2<tab>Once more, unto the breach!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE3<tab>...
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE4<tab>I suppose you want me to finish the venture too, don't you? <sigh>
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE5<tab>Pray do not disturb me until the venture is complete.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE6<tab>Patience, my good <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var>. Your venture will be finished in due time.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>I shall rrreturn to my venture, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sirrr)) /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>The wilderness calls to me, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>Farewell for now.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>I told you I'd take care of it, so stop worrying.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>Is that all? Hmph.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>...Try as I might, I can't stay mad at you.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE1<tab>Beg your pardon, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>, but I must needs return to my venture.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE2<tab>Bwahahaha! Back to me venturin'!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE3<tab>I must go now.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE4<tab>Now then, if ye'll─hic─excuse me, I've got a venture what needs doin'!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE5<tab>All right. Let me handle it.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE6<tab>Happy to be of service, chief!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>Understood, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>Ye still want me to carry out that venture, too, eh? Just checkin'.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>Acknowledged.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>'Fore you ask, I've not forgotten about the venture.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>If you want quality work, then leave me be.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>Now then, where was I...
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_AURA_MALE_TYPE1<tab>Then if you would excuse me, I should return to my venture.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_AURA_MALE_TYPE2<tab>Right, then. I ought to be getting back to that thing of yours. “Venture,” was it...?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_AURA_MALE_TYPE3<tab>We shall meet again, old friend. But now I must steal away into the night.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_AURA_MALE_TYPE4<tab>If I don't make it back, I just want you to know... Eh, the hells with it. I'll tell you next time.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_AURA_MALE_TYPE5<tab>As you wish...<var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_AURA_MALE_TYPE6<tab>I must wander to and fro;♪ But wherever I may go,♪ I shall never be untrue to thee!♪
