TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab><var 08 E905 ((My lady)) ((My lord)) /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>I suppose you'll be wanting me to finish that venture too, yes? Right, right. Don't know why I bothered asking...
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>Hmm.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>Right, so, if anyone asks, I wasn't here, agreed? Cheers.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>Go on, then. Go. It's not like I haven't more important things to do or anything.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>Hm, hm. You've really nothin' else to ask? If you say so, then.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE1<tab>I am ever at your beck and call, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE2<tab>Don't expect me to play errand boy for you forever.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE3<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Enough<var 1A 01 /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE4<tab>If there's nothing else, I'll be getting back to...er, what was it again? Oh, yes, the venture!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE5<tab>Gahahaha! Back to work for me!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE6<tab>Are you sure you don't want to spend more time with me? Ah, but I jest!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_HROTHGAR_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>I'll be on my way, then. Pray keep an eye out for my return!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_HROTHGAR_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>All good? I'll get right to it, then.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_HROTHGAR_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>I'll be on my way, then. I still have work to do...
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_HROTHGAR_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>I'll return to my leisurely stroll, then. ...Sorry, I mean “grand adventure.”
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_HROTHGAR_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>Are you <var 1A 02 /var>sure<var 1A 01 /var> I'm free to go this time? ...You're positive? Alright, then.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_HROTHGAR_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>I'll be getting back to the job, then!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>If ever you're feeling lonely, I am but a ring of the bell away.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>I am off! At least until you call me back again...
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>The road calls me again.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab><yawn> I really could use a nap...
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>Well, back to the grind! I do hope you appreciate all this!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>If that is all, I shall return to my task. Ah, the joy of adventure!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_VIERA_MALE_TYPE1<tab>Are you certain? If needs be, I can return at a moment's notice!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_VIERA_MALE_TYPE2<tab>If that'll be all, I'll get back to that other thing ye asked me to do.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_VIERA_MALE_TYPE3<tab>If you've no further need of me, I shall return to my assigned task.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_VIERA_MALE_TYPE4<tab>I'll head back out, then. Duty first, debauchery second!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_VIERA_MALE_TYPE5<tab>Hmph. You're sure that's everything? I'd rather not be running back and forth, if it's all the same to you.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_VIERA_MALE_TYPE6<tab>I really must be on the road again. Pray no harm befalls my soft, furry hide!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE1<tab>It pleases me to inform you that the venture is complete.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE2<tab>Hey, I finished that venture o' yours.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE3<tab>It is done.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE4<tab>Well, that was exhausting...
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE5<tab>Your venture is finished.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE6<tab>Guess what I finished!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>My <var 08 E905 ((lady)) ((lord)) /var>, the venture you bid me undertake has been finished.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>I've got your goods, by the way. Let me know when you want 'em.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>I have something for you.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>Thank the gods that's over.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>My venture report is ready.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>Good news, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>! The venture was a success!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE1<tab><var 08 E905 ((Madam)) ((Sir)) /var>, your venture is complete.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE2<tab>Got somethin' for you, chief!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE3<tab>I have come with your goods.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE4<tab>I took care of that venture for you.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE5<tab>You wish to hear my report?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE6<tab>Ahhh, now that was fun!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>I come with good tidings, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>This about the venture? I took care of it.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>There you are! I've brought what you requested.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>Oh, it's you. I suppose you'll want to hear about the venture.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>Let's get on with it, shall we?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>I've been waiting for your summons.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE1<tab>Hail to thee, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. You shall be pleased to hear that the venture was a success.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE2<tab>You want this stuff now or later?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE3<tab>I'm finished.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE4<tab>Been a long time comin', but the venture's finally finished.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE5<tab>Whew.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE6<tab>I did it, I did it!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>Does <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> wish to hear my report?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>'Ello, dearie. I reckon you want your goods?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>My pockets are bursting with your goods!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>Well, this was to be expected. The venture, yes?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>We should talk about the venture.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>I'm baaack!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE1<tab>My rrreport is rrready, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE2<tab>Mission accomplished, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE3<tab>...
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE4<tab>May I leave after making my report? No? <sigh>
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE5<tab>I have prepared a formal report.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE6<tab>Am I to deliver my report now, or shall we discuss other matters first?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>This cat has brought you a present, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sirrr)) /var>...
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>Ye want to hear the whole story, or just read the report?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>'Twas naught more than a rrroutine task.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>I did my very best, just like I said.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>Everythin' you need to know is in the report.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>I have so much to tell you!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE1<tab>I have brought that which you desire, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE2<tab>Bwahahaha! That venture was an <var 1A 02 /var>ad<var 1A 01 /var>venture, let me tell ye!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE3<tab>The venture is complete.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE4<tab>Venture? What in the seven hells are ye─ Oh, the <var 1A 02 /var>venture<var 1A 01 /var>! Aye, I did that.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE5<tab>Got a delivery for you. Just say the word.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE6<tab>Hey, chief! I got what ye asked for!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>I have what <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var> requested in my possession.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>I've got the goods, cap'n!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>Venture complete, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>Took a while, but the venture's done.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>I had a mind to summon <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var>, actually.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>This venturin' business ain't so bad!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_AURA_MALE_TYPE1<tab>It pleases me to inform you that the venture is complete.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_AURA_MALE_TYPE2<tab>Guess what I've got for you! No, really. Guess!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_AURA_MALE_TYPE3<tab>I renew my objection to that pointless endeavor. Informally now and by affidavit later.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_AURA_MALE_TYPE4<tab>You know, I think I'm starting to get the hang of this.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_AURA_MALE_TYPE5<tab>Per your orders, I have completed the venture...<var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_AURA_MALE_TYPE6<tab>For he himself has said it,♪ And it's greatly to his credit,♪ That he is a retainer!♪ He remains a retainer!♪
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>I have seen to the venture, <var 08 E905 ((my lady)) ((my lord)) /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>Oh, the tales I could tell you about that venture...
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>I've finished.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>Heh, didn't expect him to put up such a─ Oh! Just the <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> I was hoping to see!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>I-It's not like I risked life and limb to bring you back shiny baubles or anything.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>Oh, it has been a day such as you wouldn't believe!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE1<tab>Rest assured that I spared no effort in doing your bidding, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE2<tab>This is all you will get from me. I hope it satisfies you.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE3<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Done<var 1A 01 /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE4<tab>I'm back! Now, do you want the good news or the bad news?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE5<tab>Gahahaha! Feast your eyes on this!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE6<tab>Guess who's returned with a tale to tell? Why, <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var>, of course!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_HROTHGAR_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>I am returned! And with a souvenir for you, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_HROTHGAR_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>Done! No need to thank me!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_HROTHGAR_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>My journey was...fruitful.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_HROTHGAR_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>I followed your scent all the way home. Did you miss me, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_HROTHGAR_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>Phew...I'm back! Just wait till you see what I've brought...
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_HROTHGAR_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>Here I am, back from the trail! Returned in triumph!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>I have returned, love. And do I have a tale to tell...
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>Hah! Now <var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var> was a venture for the ages!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>There are places I would rather be, yet here I am. Be grateful.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab><yawn> Oh...that's right. I had something to tell you.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>I've returned! Come now, are you not happy to see me?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>I could scarcely wait to return to your side, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var>!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_VIERA_MALE_TYPE1<tab>I am returned! And I have come bearing a gift.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_VIERA_MALE_TYPE2<tab>About damn time! My ears were twitching summat fierce listening out for that bell...
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_VIERA_MALE_TYPE3<tab>I believe this concludes your venture, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>...
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_VIERA_MALE_TYPE4<tab>I have returned, and gods have I worked up a thirst! Oh, and this is for you!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_VIERA_MALE_TYPE5<tab>I did what you asked. You'll be wanting my full report, then?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER3_VIERA_MALE_TYPE6<tab>Wait until you see the goods I got my paws on!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ENTER_PIXIE_1<tab>Oh, my adorable sapling! You have need of <var 29 EA02 /var>, yes? But sing the word, and let your beautiful branch do what only they can.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_ACCEPT_PIXIE_1<tab>A whispered word, and off goes <var 29 EA02 /var> on a grand adventure! What wonders await at journey's end?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_COMPLETE_PIXIE_1<tab>Carried by the wind, the leaf flutters to the ground─and so does <var 29 EA02 /var> return to your side. Was the journey a fruitful one?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE_PIXIE_1<tab>You have no more need of <var 29 EA02 /var>? So be it! I shall steal quietly from your loyal servant's dreams.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_LEAVE2_PIXIE_1<tab>Very well. I shall slip quietly from <var 29 EA02 /var>'s dreams. May your leaf flutter, float, and find a way back to you.

TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERBELL_00544_EQUIP_PIXIE_1<tab>From verdant green to glittering gold, so does the leaf take on delightful hues with each new season. If you would see <var 29 EA02 /var> dressed in new colors, your beautiful branch will attend to the task.
